oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Syracuse Central High School Diploma; Harth, Ida W., 1892-06-21
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Original document reads "The Board of Education of the City of Syracuse, New York, Certify, that Ida W. Harth has satisfactorily completed a regular course of study in the Syracuse High School and has graduated therefrom. In witness Whereof, the said Board have caused this certificate to be signed by their President and Clerk and their Corporate Seal to be affixed thereto this 21st day of June, 1892." Below are signatures for the Princial, Clerk, and President.
